extendedInfo.description: ABBYY Business Card Reader is a timesaving app that makes it effortless to enter and manage your contacts. With ABBYY Business Card Reader you can:- Instantly transfer business card data in 20 languages right onto your smartphone- Save contacts in the CardHolder, a special archive with convenient search, sorting and grouping functionality- Share contact data via e-mail, SMS or WiFi (thanks to the wireless communication technology AllJoyn from Qualcomm)- Transfer contacts to another smartphone or computer.This is a Lite version: Data from First Name, Last Name, and the first detected Phone field is saved to the Contacts. Facebook search option is available in this version.  You can buy the full version on the Android Market.System requirements: OS Android version 2.1 and higher, camera with auto focus.MAIN FEATURES: â Forget having to manually enter contact details into your smartphone. Unsurpassed data recognition and speed, eliminate having to correct or re-key data, making creating new contacts easy and automatic. â Quickly find the contact you need. So CardHolder, the app's archive, provides convenient business card search, sorting and grouping functionality. So you can quickly and easily find the information you need. â Always have your contacts secured. Archive and restore data from saved business cards to transfer to another smartphone or computer. â Share contacts with others on the fly. Exchange recognized business cards via e-mail or SMS in convenient formats: text, image or *.vcf. â Find your colleagues and friends in social networks. Find out more about your new contact on the most popular social networks such as Linkedln*, Facebook and Twitter* instantly! â Recognize your contact and instantly find the addresses. Search in Maps* for the address of your contact with just one tap, directly in Business Card Reader. â Quickly verify recognition results. Insecure characters are highlighted to help you quickly check the recognition results. â Recognizes business cards in 20 languages, including multilingual cards: -Danish -English -Estonian -Finnish -German -Greek -Indonesian -Italian -Korean -Norwegian (both Bokmal and Nynorsk) -Polish -Portuguese -Portuguese (Brazilian) -Russian -Spanish -Swedish -UkrainianFOLLOW US on Twitter http://twitter.com/ABBYY_MobileABBYY Mobile on Facebook: http://facebook.com/AbbyyMobileDistributive size is 25 MB. The installed application requires 30 MB.During installation the application may require up to 40 MB of free space on the internal storage.*available in full version onlybusiness cards, bizcard reader, business card scanner, BCR software, biz card, contact, group, BCR, Business Card Reader, business cards, business card scanner, scan, scan card, card recognition

reviews.title: Below average
reviews.comment: Could recognize 1 out of 4. Others for some reason rotates vertically and then cannot do anything. Will not buy.
reviews.author: Alexander Rivkind

reviews.title: Free version not worth it
reviews.comment: Lite version only lets you save one name and one number,  so for instance if business name is For Ever Floors it would only save For.
reviews.author: Adrian G

reviews.title: not soo good
reviews.comment: would not save much. camera function wont focus. Cant see whole card in any way but thumbnail.
reviews.author: Miranda Cunningham

reviews.title: accuracy is good but not much use.
reviews.comment: there many other choices better than this. but software is not bad.
reviews.author: Spring Zhang

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: Can only take pictures. And on a Samsung, picture are useless. I would give -1 if I could There is a simular app on windows 8.  1000 times better, and it\'s free.
reviews.author: gaetan la

reviews.title: Failed to recognize a basic / simple business card
reviews.comment: Failed to recognize a basic / simple business card.  3 attempts and every attempt resulted in differences but none were even close to the actual business card itself.  Un-installed.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Way too sure of itself
reviews.comment: The text recognition was good but it refused to allow me to Paste text to deal with the fact that it could not properly handle a title spread over two lines. This makes it useless.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Not a good app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Brilliant but too expensive
reviews.comment: Just  tried this and it works great, but not worth 6quid :s  Drop the price by 50% and I am sure your customer base will more than double! It\'s gone up from 6 to 10, you guys are havin a giraffe? There\'s loads of cheaper apps to choose from. Goodbye!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very poor
reviews.comment: Very clear san-serif fonts readable in other scanners were missed in this app.  Also doesn\'t seem to allow for switching cameras (Asus Transformer)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: Uninstalled after 5 minutes. Doesn\'t recognise anything, not even the company name. Forget it!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Nearly 30Mb download & it\'ll save one field. The full version might be much better but how can I be sure its worth buying and installing?
reviews.author: A Google User
